name: repo1
content: import org.sonatype.nexus.blobstore.api.BlobStoreManager;repository.createDockerHosted('docker-hub','https://nexus.ggl.huseyinakten.ner','HUB',null,8085,null,BlobStoreManager.DEFAULT_BLOBSTORE_NAME,true,true);def groupMembers = ['docker-hub', 'docker-internal'];repository.createDockerGroup('docker-all', null, 18443, groupMembers, true);log.info('Script dockerRepositories completed successfully')
